tools

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.FileUtils

  • public final class FileUtils
extends Object

    Utility class that only is used to save and load files.

    format May be png or jpg. filename Name of the saved file and must not be empty.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String getFileName() 
      static String getFormat() 
      static BufferedImage loadImageAsARGB(File file) 
      static void saveFile(BufferedImage img) 
      static void setFileLocation(String fileName) 
      static void setFormat(String format) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • setFileLocation

        public static void setFileLocation(String fileName)
        Parameters:
        fileName - Sets name for filename and checks for fileName not to be empty or null. Does nothing if filename is invalid.

      • loadImageAsARGB

        public static BufferedImage loadImageAsARGB(File file)
        Parameters:
        file - Pointer to image
        Returns:
        BufferedImage as BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_ARGB regardless of file original extension.
        returns null if fails.

      • saveFile

        public static void saveFile(BufferedImage img)
        Parameters:
        img - BufferedImage to be saved on a file according to filename and its format Does nothing if exception occurs.

      • setFormat

        public static void setFormat(String format)
        Parameters:
        format - Sets format to png or jpg. If format is something else does nothing

      • getFormat

        public static String getFormat()

      • getFileName

        public static String getFileName()
